original_title: Bernstein In Vienna: Beethoven, Piano Concerto No. 1 in C Major
overview: In Vienna's Musikverein, Leonard Bernstein and the Vienna Philharmonic celebrates Ludwig Van Beethoven's 200th birthday with a joyful performance of his Piano Concerto No. 1 in C Major. Maestro Bernstein conducts the orchestra from the keyboard in this historic concert.
title: Bernstein In Vienna: Beethoven, Piano Concerto No. 1 in C Major
